title: Dark Side of the Paranormal
description:
The AD-FREE version of this episode and all of our others is available right now on Patreon.


My special guest tonight is author June Lundgren who's here to discuss her experience with the evil side of the paranormal.


Wanna listen to the shows without the ads? Become a 'Mysterious Radio Truther' to enjoy every podcast "AD-FREE" right now!
